> Now parsing BS from 1th ptrition FAT12/16: 

 >Sig of boot sector (for BIOS) word hex : AA55
 >Total sectors dword hex : 000EB516|dec : 963862
 >Size (dec) , Kbytes : 481931 | Mbytes : 470
 >Media type byte : F8 {f0,f8,f9,fa,fb,fc,fd,fe,ff} 
 >Count of sectors in reserved region (dec) : 33

> FAT12 FAT16 spec: 
 > BootSig0x29 : 29 {0x29 only for 12/16} 
 > Text 8 bytes ASCII :[FAT16   ]

> Now parsing BS from 1th ptrition FAT32: 

 >Sig of boot sector (for BIOS) word hex : AA55
 >Total sectors dword hex : 000EB516|dec : 963862
 >Size (dec) , Kbytes : 481931 | Mbytes : 470
 >Media type byte : F8 {f0,f8,f9,fa,fb,fc,fd,fe,ff} 
 >Count of sectors in reserved region (dec) : 33

> FAT32 spec: 

> Add count of sectors in reserved region and First sec of patrition:
 >Count of sectors in reserved region (dec) : 
 >calc : 33 + 38 = 71
